data.eml:eml: Description of females of Chilarboreus Ruta, 2011 (Coleoptera: Scirtidae: Scirtinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ruta, Rafał, Yoshitomi, Hiroyuki (2018): Description of females of Chilarboreus Ruta, 2011 (Coleoptera: Scirtidae: Scirtinae). Zootaxa 4388 (2): 265-274, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4388.2.8
